intro_text: Proficient in machine learning technologies with consolidated knowledge in both supervised and unsupervised algorithms, covering a wide range of toolkits including decision trees, support vector machines, gradient descent for loss optimization, isolation forest, and so on.

Proven capability through hands-on experience in solving real data science problems using Numpy, Scikit-learn, Tensorflow and way more other libraries and platforms, and handling end-to-end machine learning pipelines from data processing, feature engineering, model training to output validation.

regression: Fitting numerics for prediction and cutomizing loss for objective optimization
classification: Multi class classification using traditional ML and neural networks
clustering: Supervised and unsupervised data clustering for visualization & further analysis
time_series: Time sequence based trend & seasonality analysis using ARIMA, Prophet and so on
topic_modeling: Visualized dimensionality reduction for feature engineering & data assessment
anomaly_detection: Refining data & excluding anomalies for model training and data auditing

widget_maintenance: A data science project on the widget maintenance dataset to explore feature trends of its data generating system and predict the units failure probability and time sequence trends.
worldwide_products: A data science project on the manufacturing product demand dataset to explore the seasonal trend in features and build time series model to predict the product demands.
the_oscars: Conducting topic modeling further on the Shakespeare play dataset, and applying data storytelling for interactive topic visualization.
major_leagues: European football data mining and aggregation on Premier League, Champions League and other tournament data provided by soccer SPI. Full time match score prediction using boosting techniques and regression networks.
shakespear_plays: To Be, or Not to Be
Exploring all Shakespeare plays text for recognizing useful features and predicting the player out of the play lines using classification models.
news_headline: Topic modeling project on the news title headline dataset to explore title feature information and discover yearly topics using natural language processing models.
dream_of_anomalies: A data science project on applying anomaly detection techniques on the website streaming dataset to discover abnormal data samples.
dynamic_duo: Analyzing & diagnosing US cross border entry data from 1996 to 2019 for US border entry prediction, time series analysis and visualized storytelling.
